content: this is the pattern for my ned doll ned is from twenty one pilots chlorine music video i love twenty one pilots i ve been to 2 of their concerts and i absolutely love fusing music with crochet so i thought it would be fun to make my own ned you can make your own ned too the paid version is a printable beautifully-designed pdf that contains photos if you prefer the free version please visit my website 1 materials white yarn weight 4 gray yarn weight 4 optional blue yarn weight 4 safety eyes 12 mm hook 3 75 mm yarn needle to weave ends and sew pieces together stitch marker to mark your place stuffing *hook size and yarn weight can be adjusted to result in a smaller or larger doll -- these materials will result in a doll of about 5 inches tall ned doll crochet pattern pdf * an instant download of a printable pdf file containing instructions to make your ned doll * contains photos to guide you through the steps * easy-level but you should know how to magic_ring single_crochet and increase/decrease * terms are in us conventions * written in english if you like seeing my crochet goodies check out my instagram @joselyncrochets 1 https //joselyncrochets wordpress com/2019/03/31/free-pattern-ned-doll-twenty-one-pilots-chlorine-mv/
